https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8vAjcYo5cWNka8EQBOw4XxN1sDJ.jpg In a modern version of Ibsen's stage play, we meet TV-celebrity Tomas Stockman returning to his native village to produce the world's purest bottled water. The plant will bring new life and hope to the village, but unexpected trouble occurs. An Enemy of the People
